objects.description: [BeaverTail](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1246) has stolen passwords saved in web browsers.(Citation: Esentire ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2024)(Citation: Socket BeaverTail XORIndex HexEval Contagious Interview July 2025)(Citation: Socket HexEval BeaverTail Contagious Interview June 2025)(Citation: PaloAlto Unit42 ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibileFerret October 2024) [BeaverTail](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1246) has also been known to collect login data from Firefox within key3.db, key4.db and logins.json from `/.mozilla/firefox/` for exfiltration.(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)
